en.title: Professor D. Structo's Monster Maker
en.mainText0: Ah, hello there. You must be my latest assistant. Please, allow me to introduce myself.
en.mainText1: My name is Professor David Structo, and I am founder and C.E.O of Build A Monster Inc.
en.mainText2: Here at Build A Monster Inc. we don't want to build just any monster. We insist on building the best monster we can.
en.mainText3: That means we test our monsters to breaking point and beyond. Then we gather up all that lovely, lovely data.
en.mainText4: Your job is to help me make sense of that data, and also clean up the mess.
en.mainText5: The latest batch of test data is on the screen. Let's take a close look and see how our monsters performed.
en.mainText6: Well, looking at the raw data in a table doesn't tell us much. We need a better way to show our data.
en.mainText7: Let's look at the monster lifetime data first. We'll use a stem and leaf plot to represent the information.
en.mainText8: Okay. We sort our values from smallest to largest. The stem on the left shows the tens and the leaf on the right shows the ones.
en.mainText8_5: Now we can see where the highest frequencies of monster lifespan are. As a little test, click to show me where that is.
en.mainText9: Correct, very well done. Okay, now let's take a look at the monster speed data.
en.mainText10: Oh dear. Well, that's no good at all. With such a small data range the stem and leaf plot doesn't tell us anything useful.
en.mainText11: We need to represent the data in a different way. Let's try a line plot instead.
en.mainText11_5: A line plot shows the frequency of data along a number line. We place an X at the correct place on the line.
en.mainText12: Now, that is much better. Can you click on the most common speed?
en.mainText13: Good. Now we can start trying to improve on our monster formula. We will add ingredients to our secret formula and see what effect they have.
en.mainText16: Now let's see the full set of results from our tests.
en.mainText17: Again, we need to show the data in a graph to make sense of it. Let's look at just the lifetime data.
en.mainText18: This data has quite a broad range. Which type of graph should we use?
en.mainText19a: Good, I think that's the best way to show this data.
en.mainText19b: Actually, I think a stem and leaf plot would work better here. Let's try that instead.
en.mainText22: Next, let's do the same with the new speed data. This time the range is quite narrow. Which graph type should we use?
en.mainText23a: Yes, that's a good choice of graph.
en.mainText23b: Again, a stem and leaf plot doesn't work well here. Let's try a line plot instead.
en.mainText27a: Well done, that's a good day's work. I look forward to seeing you again to test more ingredients.
en.mainText27b: Excellent work. You've done all you need to today, but you're welcome to help test the other ingredients.
en.possResponses0: Really? I just added that to the list as a joke. Still, I suppose it's worth a try.
en.possResponses1: That's certainly an interesting choice. I do hope you're taking this seriously.
en.possResponses2: Not my first choice, but what's the worst that can happen?
en.diffResponse1: There's a definite improvement on the original formula. Good choice.
en.diffResponse2: Not much difference from our original formula, maybe a little higher.
en.diffResponse3: I can't really see that there's any difference from the original formula at all.
en.diffResponse4: Not much difference from our original formula, maybe a little lower.
en.diffResponse5: This is not what we were hoping for at all. The new ingredient reduced performance.
en.finalResponse1: So, we've finished testing and we can now say there's a definite improvement in monster life and a clear improvement in monster speed.
en.finalResponse2: So, we've finished testing and we can now say there's a definite improvement in monster life and not much change in monster speed.
en.finalResponse3: So, we've finished testing and we can now say there's a definite improvement in monster life and an obvious drop in monster speed.
en.finalResponse4: So, we've finished testing and we can now say there's no real difference in monster life and a clear improvement in monster speed.
en.finalResponse5: So, we've finished testing and we can now say there's no real difference in monster life and not much change in monster speed.
